videos.title: Alone in Patagonia
videos.description:
The idea of traveling solo through Patagonia always felt a little intimidating. Not because I didn‚Äôt want to go‚Äîbut because I wasn‚Äôt sure how I‚Äôd handle being truly alone. No one to laugh with, no one to share the view, just me, the road, and my camera.

In this cinematic travel film, I take you with me through southern Patagonia‚Äîfrom the iconic granite horns of Torres del Paine National Park in Chile, to the jagged spires of Mount Fitz Roy in El Chalt√©n, Argentina. 

Whether you‚Äôre planning your own trip to Patagonia, dreaming of solo travel adventures, or just here for the views‚ÄîI hope this story helps you feel a little more okay with not having all the answers. Thanks for being here.

--

Filmed solo on the Sony FX3. 
Color graded with my Endura Tone LUTs: www.kylekotajarvi.com/luts

--

My cinema camera: https://amzn.to/4imtSC3
My travel tripod: https://amzn.to/4k49yqQ
The best tool for filming yourself: https://amzn.to/3Xszy5V

--

Music via Musicbed. Sign up here: https://fm.pxf.io/Py32Aj

videos.title: Life Lessons from Nepal - Cinematic Travel Vlog Through Himalayas Shot on Sony A7siii
videos.description:
Riding A Motorcycle Through The Himalayas ,across Nepal, to Lo Monthang ‚úåüèΩ

As a filmmaker, I set out to capture Nepal through a cinematic lens, but the experience became more than just a project. Riding through mountains and valleys, I found myself reflecting on life in unexpected ways. This is a visual story of the places we went, the moments that stayed with me, and the lessons I took home.

videos.title: a film about friendship | 10,000 miles
videos.description:
Hold onto your childhood friends. You can go through life never meeting anyone quite like them again.
Three years later Matt, Chad, Daniel, Nick, Noah, and I would meet up and backpack Europe together. 

That reunion adventure is almost finished and will be posted this summer.

A heartfelt review someone wrote that you should read: https://open.substack.com/pub/learningtobefriends/p/review-a-film-about-friendship?utm_campaign=post&utm_medium=web

videos.title: Top 5 MUST VISIT Places in Peru | Backpacking South America | 2023
videos.description:
Come with us as we travel Peru üáµüá™ 

As we gear up for our next holiday, we came across this video we created to track our experiences in Peru ü¶ô 

From the epic scenery to its generous and kind people, we can‚Äôt wait to get back to Peru. If you are travelling there be sure to visit these destinations:

üèîÔ∏è Huacachina - sand dunes and buggy riding 
üèîÔ∏è Machu Picchu - one of the world wonders 
üèîÔ∏è Rainbow Mountain - we chose the easier of the two and it was worth every second 
üèîÔ∏è Lake Humantay - a difficult but picturesque hike (can rent a donkey if you need)
üèîÔ∏è Mountain View Experiences - the highlight of our trip, the beautiful, isolated stay filled with luxury and alpacas

P.s. no alpacas were harmed in the making of this video 

#peru  #backpacking  #southamerica  #travel  #huacachina  #palcoyorainbowmountain #machupicchu  #lakehumantay #mountainviewexperience

videos.title: Travel to the Depths of Our Mysterious Oceans | 4K UHD | Blue Planet II | BBC Earth
videos.description:
Through Blue Planet II, travel to the depths of our mysterious oceans to discover all kinds of curious creatures underwater ‚Äì from fish that communicate by glowing to the deadly Portuguese Man O' War.

Subscribe: http://bit.ly/BBCEarthSub 

Watch more: 
Planet Earth http://bit.ly/PlanetEarthPlaylist 
Blue Planet http://bit.ly/BluePlanetPlaylist 
Planet Earth II http://bit.ly/PlanetEarthIIPlaylist 
Planet Dinosaur https://bit.ly/PlanetDinosaurPlaylist

Taken From Blue Planet II 
This bold cinematic experience takes viewers on a magical adventure across the greatest, yet least known, parts of our planet ‚Äì our oceans. Since Blue Planet aired in 2001, our understanding of life beneath the waves has completely changed. Travelling from the icy polar seas to the vibrant blues of the coral atolls, this series shares these astonishing new discoveries. Meet the strange octopuses lurking in the depths of the Antarctic Ocean. Watch giant trevally fish leap to catch birds in mid-air. And ride on the back of a hammerhead shark as it attacks. Inspiring awe and wonder, Blue Planet II reveals surprising new places, charismatic new characters and extraordinary new behaviours.

Welcome to BBC EARTH! The world is an amazing place full of stories, beauty and natural wonder. Here you'll find 50 years worth of entertaining and thought-provoking natural history content. Dramatic, rare, and exclusive, nature doesn't get more exciting than this.

This is a commercial page from BBC Studios. Service information and feedback: http://bbcworldwide.com/vod-feedback--contact-details.aspx

00:00:00 The Deadly Portuguese Man O‚ÄôWar
00:05:14 Stingray Ambushes Army Of Crabs

00:16:22 Cuttlefish Hypnotises Prey

videos.title: WONDERS OF PLANET EARTH | Most Magnificent Places | Travel Documentary 4K
videos.description:
Embark on a 90-minute cinematic voyage to Earth's most breathtaking and uncharted destinations. 

This visual odyssey transports you to the farthest corners of the globe, where nature's artistry surpasses the imagination, revealing landscapes and phenomena that defy belief. From mystical formations sculpted over millennia to ancient wonders where human history intertwines with geological marvels, witness landscapes plucked from fantasy, narrated with captivating detail and insight. 

Join us in rediscovering our world, marveling at its vastness and beauty, and embracing the wonder that lies in the heart of Earth's hidden treasures.

videos.title: MADAGASCAR: The Last Untouched Wilderness | 4K Travel Documentary
videos.description:
MADAGASCAR: The Last Untouched Wilderness | 4K Travel Documentary

Thousands of years ago, people set sail into the unknown ‚Äî across 5,000 km of open ocean ‚Äî and found a new world.
That voyage gave birth to Madagascar ‚Äî where Asia met Africa, and two worlds became one.
But who were these people?
And what was it about this distant island that drew them across the endless sea? üåä
Every face, every song, every forest in Madagascar still carries echoes of that impossible journey.

videos.title: UNREAL PLACES - The Most Unbelievable Wonders of Planet Earth
videos.description:
Let's explore the most amazing man-made and natural wonders of our Planet Earth. In this thrilling documentary we will take you on an adventure around the planet, uncovering the most beautiful places that exist on our green planet. 

Let's delve into the exploration of awe-inspiring landscapes, including majestic mountains, tumbling waterfalls, expansive glaciers, secret caves, erupting volcanoes, geological craters and canyons, the diverse marine life of underwater worlds, and lush jungles.

We will visit over 150 different locations in this FREE 4k documentary including: Old Man of Storr, Cappadocia, Grand Canyon, Valle de la Luna, Mount Fanjing Temple, Valley of the Baobabs, Lencois Maranhenses, Faroe Islands, Banff National Park, Amazon Rainforest, Matterhorn, Petra, Richat Structure, Monument Valley, Lake Natron, Greenland, Petrified Forest, Waitomo Caves, Death Valley, Moorea, Cliffs of Moher, Nusa Penida, Yosemite, Sahara Desert, Ice Hotel, Angel Falls, Antarctice, Deadvlei, and many many more!

Travpedia, a vibrant travel channel on YouTube, specializes in engaging travel videos and documentaries. Echoing the spirit of National Geographic and Nat Geo, it offers a rich tapestry of content, from immersive nature documentaries to insightful free documentaries. As a hub for travel education, Travpedia explores the intricacies of tourism, the wonders of Earth, and the captivating world of wildlife documentaries. Inspired by acclaimed series like 'Our Planet' and 'Blue Planet', the channel is a gateway to discovering diverse cultures and landscapes, making it an ideal destination for anyone passionate about the beauty and diversity of our Planet Earth.

videos.title: UNSEEN WONDERS | Hidden Places Even Locals Can‚Äôt Believe Exist | Travel Video 4K
videos.description:
UNSEEN WONDERS | Hidden Places Even Locals Can‚Äôt Believe Exist | Travel Video 4K

Some places are so well hidden, even the people who live nearby can‚Äôt believe they exist. In this video, we take you deep into the heart of Earth‚Äôs most unbelievable secret locations‚Äîancient ruins, mystical forests, hidden lakes, and forgotten towns that defy logic and time. These unseen wonders are tucked far from the spotlight, waiting for curious eyes to discover them. If you think you‚Äôve seen it all, think again. Like, comment, and subscribe to New Travel Insight  for more jaw-dropping places that prove the world is still full of magic.

videos.title: Alaska Adventure | 8000 Mile Motorcycle Road Trip | Documentary
videos.description:
Join me on this once in a lifetime Alaska Adventure, as I fulfill a life long dream of riding my Kawasaki Versys 650 motorcycle 8,000 miles, from my home in California to Alaska and back. Ride along with me for 32 days of epic roads, beautiful scenery, remote camping, and crazy weather as I set out to attempt the most difficult ride of my life. Will broken chains, worn down tires, closed roads, and over 20 days of rain stop me from completing my goal? See what it is like to live on the road with me in this 2 hour and 52 minute Alaska Adventure Documentary.

Video/Music by @shredvision
Filmed by @shredvision
https://linktr.ee/shredvision

Buy/Rent on Amazon Ad Free
https://www.amazon.com/gp/video/detail/B0D3FVKVL9/ref=atv_dp_share_cu_r

If you enjoyed this video, please subscribe, share with friends, and comment what you liked about the experience. Thank you for your support!

videos.title: Iceland 6-Day Adventure Motorcycle Tour
videos.description:
In September 2023 I took a 6-day motorcycle trip run by RIDE WITH LOCALS - An Icelandic tour company.    It was undoubtedly the most beautiful off-road riding I have ever done.

The Tour Company I used is called Ride With Locals. https://ridewithlocals.is/
videos.author: Brent Pearson

videos.title: Riding the Pyrenees Mountains | My First European Motorcycle Adventure
videos.description:
Three days, two modern calssic motorcycles, and one epic ride through the Pyrenees Mountains.
In this video, I take you along on my first European motorcycle adventure from Barcelona to the French border, riding through mountain passes, fog, rain, and endless twisty roads.

I‚Äôm joined by Puko on his custom Triumph Thruxton 1200, while I ride a Bonneville T120 Black, generously provided by Triumph Girona.
We explore remote villages, stop for coffee breaks in old towns, and rip through endless roads.

Route: Barcelona ‚Üí Girona ‚Üí Pyrenees ‚Üí French Border
Bikes: Triumph Bonneville T120 Black & Triumph Thruxton 1200
Music: Licensed via Artlist
Shot on: Sony A7S III, Insta360 Ace Pro 2, Insta360 X5

Everything I use is here: https://www.liinks.co/moztreet

videos.title: Yellowstone Adventure | 3000 Mile Motorcycle Road Trip | Documentary
videos.description:
Shred Vision crew head out on an epic 3,000 mile, 8 state, 13 day motorcycle road trip across the Western United States. Follow their adventure as they ride and camp some beautiful scenery, and explore Yellowstone National Park, Grand Teton National Park, Glacier National Park, Crater Lake National Park, and Zion National Park, and more all while overcoming some difficult problems along the way. See what it's like to ride with the Shred Boys in this 35 minute documentary film.

Video/Music 
@bigcshreds @shredvision

https://linktr.ee/shredvision
Filmed by @bigcshreds | @connectedvisions | @yanator22

Buy Me A Coffee - We appreciate it!!!
https://www.buymeacoffee.com/shredvision
